text: Mentha suaveolens, the apple mint, is a fast-growing member of the mint family Lamiaceae. and is native to southern and western Europe including the Mediterranean region. it is a Herbaceous plant, upright perennial plant. == Description == it's a small plant that grows 30 up to 60 centimeters == Resources == Category:Herbs Category:Lamiaceae
title: Mentha suaveolens
